page.title: 03SCARBOROUGH GENERAL HOSPITAL
page.content: The hospital covers 4 acres off Scalby Road.It has a budget of Â£7.1m and cares for people from Scarborough, Whitby,Malton,Bridlington and also holiday makers.The hospital refers some serious conditions like head injuries,heart/chest problems,burns, maternity problems to hospitals in Leeds and Hull. The hospital comprises 2 surgical wards(28beds),2 medical wards(28beds), 1 children's ward(26beds) and 35 beds for orthopaedic patients and planned operations. 1000 employees include nurses,doctors,administrators,cleaners launderers,catering etc.The hospital can take 236 people but in outpatients there is no limit as they can be transferred to other hospitals. The hospital deals with over 1110 children in a year!
